name: Amber Glow
description: Prized for its ability to dissolve negative energy, amber balances emotions and attracts good luck while helping even out skin tone and erasing fine lines.

name: Amethyst Purify
description: Known as the “soul stone,” amethyst purifies negative energy, cleanses and promotes oxygen flow to the skin.

name: Aquamarine Refresh
description: Associated with courage, strength, and confidence, aquamarine soothes, moisturizes, and refreshes skin.

name: Aventurine Opportunity
description: The “stone of opportunity” helps sweep away bad habits, encourages new patterns of prosperity, soothes sensitive skin, and handles acne and blemishes.

name: Diamond Brilliance
description: The “king of gems” stimulates creativity and promotes strength while nourishing and exfoliating skin, along with preventing collagen degradation.

name: Gold Radiance
description: Symbolizing flexibility on one’s spiritual path and associated with vitality, gold delivers much-needed antioxidants to the skin and reduces wrinkles.

name: Pearl Luster
description: Viewed as a vehicle for channeling wisdom and long a symbol of purity, pearl controls oily skin and fights free radicals to produce anti-aging benefits.

name: Crystal Clarity
description: Amplifying whichever energy it receives, rock crystal symbolizes purity and helps skin by cleansing, moisturizing, and promoting overall skin health.

name: Rose Quartz Love
description: Known as a “love stone” because of its ability to strengthen various types of love, rose quartz also helps diminish wrinkles, even out skin tone, and help skin glow.

name: Ruby Passion
description: This talisman of passion, protection, and prosperity was associated with wisdom and helps nourish skin while promoting a youthful glow.

name: Sapphire Wisdom
description: Believed to be connected to the heavens and to open the doors to spiritual insights, sapphire energizes skin for anti-aging, soothes inflamed skin, and combats wrinkles.
